data.title: Run down, not very good food
data.text: I have lived in the area by Venus Burgers for years and have watched it go down hill. The facility is now just run down and the food has taken a turn for the ultimate worst. I tried a few times just-in-case it was just the day or the cook, but nope, food is not that good (at all) and the place is falling apart. I would not recommend

data.title: Shocking
data.text: who knew a place called Venus Burger can have delicious menudo?  I was not expecting too much but boy was I impressed.  Broth is excellent, right ratio of Tripas and hominy. It comes complete with home made corn tortillas and all the trimmings.  Great service too, I usually call my order in for pick up and they are always courteous. It's a must try, I highly recommend!!👍🏼👍🏼

data.title: Great local burger place
data.text: Been going here for the last 8 + yrs. The food is awesome.Especially the pastrami sandwich and fried zucchini. The service is excellent. I recently arrived 10 minutes after closing and was let in to order food to go.After a long day it was greatly appreciated. I highly recommend this place!

data.title: Simple, plentiful, affordable and very good
data.text: The proprietors make every effort to provide a good meal in a clean environment at an affordable price. Most meals include drink and side in the $7-8 range. VERY friendly and attentive. They serve a variety of breakfast, burger, burrito, gyro and similar foods. It's exactly the kind of family place you'd find in small-town America.

data.title: good Food
data.text: Always get breakfast burrito on Fridays and sometime hit it for lunch. Never have went away not feeling that I got a good meal for a good valve. I don't think I would make a special trip across town to eat here but they are good for a stop and eat between jobs.

data.title: Home town
data.text: I still remember as a child when Venus burgers opened in Moreno valley. We would go there as a family all the time. I loved that place. When they closed and I found out later they re located and re opened I had to go. I love supporting the mom and pop business. I would rather go there any day. Good food, Good service, good prices

data.title: Decent little mom and pop place
data.text: The cook and the server are really nice and friendly.My husband ordered chili cheese fries ,i had carne asada burrito and a fish sandwich for a friend. At first looking at their menu we're like its pricey but then when they brought the food it was reasonable ,they're not skimpy on the chillies thats for sure and its tasty too, my burrito was small for the price because i opt out for the rice in it :) and it was tasty too ,i ate it all. The place is clean , quite, and oh you have to go order at the counter and the food will be brought over to your table, but if they're not busy and you have handicap people with you (like my company today) they come to your table and take your order. First time here and its not bad, would like to go back again and try other stuff in the menu.

data.title: like eating at home.
data.text: Venus Burger is a very friendly mom & pop restaurant.   You always feel at home there and they make my meal to my specifications.   My friend always adds to her hash browns and they are very willing to make it your way.    Every time I eat there they specifically ask how I want the food cooked - etc.    The all booth restaurant gives you a private feeling.

data.title: Not Too Great-FoodToo Greasy!!!!!
data.text:
usually I go to Yellow Basket in my neighborhood in Menifee,
but I was near this place,thought i would give it a try.
unfortunately when the food came,it was way too greasy and
had no taste-very blah!!!
No one ever came to the table to see if I neded something,this 
place if probably more suited for take out,even though there 
are table with chairs set up and booths.
Will not come back here again-wouldnt recommend it.

data.title: Decent burger joint
data.text: It's not great food but its not bad either. I would probably choose yellow basket over this but this is more convenient.
